Function Documentation

function alg_Landweber ( in  rec_obj,
in  S,
in  Cr,
in  Cm,
in  Ep,
in  alfa 
)

alg_Landweber calculates one step of Landweber iteration

Parameters:
S sensitivity matrix
Cr vector of capacitances to be measured for current estimation of Ep
Cm vector of measured capacitances
Ep current estimation of permittivity distribution (previous step) in form of column vector
alfa relaxation factor (step length)
Return values:
Ep (column vector) new better estimation of permittivity
